core

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.DatabaseManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GamesManager, ResourcesManager

    public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A master class for all database manager. Regroups the methods used by all database manager and the location of the database file.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon
